content.en: Computational Geometry Algorithms: Researchers have developed algorithms to address various research questions in the field of computational geometry. These algorithms are used to construct high representativity triangulations, enumerate different types of triangulations, prove the existence of even triangulations, modify triangulations to make them more efficient, construct a hierarchy of surface models, compute minimum weight pseudo-triangulations, enumerate pointed pseudo-triangulations, determine the Heegaard genus of 3-manifolds, decompose and enumerate triangulated surfaces, and more. These algorithms play a crucial role in solving complex geometric problems and improving our understanding of geometric structures.
content.da: Algoritmer i Beregningsgeometri: Forskere har udviklet algoritmer til at adressere forskellige forskningsspørgsmål inden for beregningsgeometri. Disse algoritmer bruges til at konstruere trianguleringer med høj repræsentativitet, opregne forskellige typer trianguleringer, bevise eksistensen af lige trianguleringer, modificere trianguleringer for at gøre dem mere effektive, konstruere en hierarki af overflademodeller, beregne minimumsvægt pseudo-trianguleringer, opregne peggede pseudo-trianguleringer, bestemme Heegaard-genus for 3-manifolder, opdele og opregne triangulerede overflader og mere. Disse algoritmer spiller en afgørende rolle i løsningen af komplekse geometriske problemer og forbedrer vores forståelse af geometriske strukturer.
